predicate.note: Frames file for 'forgo' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: KKR also signaled to the company 's creditors that Henry Kravis and other KKR directors of SCI TV would resign from the board once the restructuring is completed [*-1] and forgo their voting rights .
example.arg: Henry Kravis and other KKR directors of SCI TV
